plot: The two-reel short shows a "typical" British bachelor, residing at a 'typical' British boarding house, preparing himself for the day's work, and having all the trials and tribulations that could be experienced in a modest boarding house.
title: And So to Work
plot_es: The two-reel short shows a "typical" British bachelor, residing at a 'typical' British boarding house, preparing himself for the day's work, and having all the trials and tribulations that could be experienced in a modest boarding house.
plot_en: The two-reel short shows a "typical" British bachelor, residing at a 'typical' British boarding house, preparing himself for the day's work, and having all the trials and tribulations that could be experienced in a modest boarding house.
